additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aloe Vera Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Purified Water, Ammonium Lauryl Sulphate (Coconut Derived), Cocobetaine (Coconut Derived), Glycerine (Vegetable), Sodium Cocoamphoacetate (Coconut Derived), Lauryl Glucoside (Coconut & Glucose Derived), Sodium Cocoyl Glucamate (Coconut & Glucose Derived), Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate (Coconut & Glucose Derived), Sodium Chloride, Melaleuca Oil (Pure Tea Tree Oil), Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Yellow 5

additionalProperty.name: Ethical
additionalProperty.value: No Animal Testing, Australian Made and Owned

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: FOR ANIMAL TREATMENT ONLYWarning: Avoid contact with eyes, if eye contact occurs immediately rinse with water. If a rash or irritation occurs discontinue use. Avoid wetting inside ears of your pet.KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

description: Our Dog Natural Tea Tree Oil Shampoo is a safe and gentle shampoo formulated from natural ingredients including Tea Tree Oil to give your dog a clean, shiny coat and helps keep fleas away.
name: Tea Tree Oil Shampoo
